problems.title: Number Square Pattern
problems.description:
Print a square pattern where each row contains the same number repeated. Row 1 has all 1s, row 2 has all 2s, etc.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows and columns.

Output Format:
Print a square pattern with N rows and N columns. Each row contains the same number (row number) repeated N times.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
11111
22222
33333
44444
55555

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
111
222
333
hintsList: For each row i, print the number i repeated N times. Use nested loops - outer for rows, inner for columns.
